ygData.subject: Re: A few words about bards  - OT
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have to disagree, the cold iron morningstar is not the rare loot, the runed circlet is... On the same rare spawn, but he carry the morningstar a lot more
ygData.messageBody:
John Kim wrote:

> Magic 1h-blunt weapons are hard to come by. The first my
> friends and I got was a screaming mace, which is quite an
> undertaking to obtain. So while the damage on the water and
> slime crystal staves is nothing spectacular (5/28), they are
> good weapons to pull out every couple levels to top off your
> 1h-blunt skill. The *optimal* 1h blunt bard weapon to do this
> past about level 20 would probably be a cold iron morningstar
> (9/38? 9/35? and 4.5 lbs), but it's a rare drop.

I have to disagree, the cold iron morningstar is not the rare loot, the runed
circlet is... On the same rare spawn, but he carry the morningstar a lot more
than the circlet...

I whent there with my friend to get him a circlet... we had 3 morningstars
before we finaly got a circlet...

But it is the perfect weapon to increase your Blunt, and a full party of low to
mid 20 can get it... And it is 9/35... not bad. Don't know if it is camped now,
probably. I whent there when it was not on the web yet...

Now for anyone that hate crowded place, Upper guk is great. I still hunt in
there, and at lvl 29, they are some yellow frog... They are some named frog that
little people know about, like the "Froglock Summoner". You hate to have to
recharm your pet, just summon yourself a fire elemental pet...

Good hunting.

--
Gaeanu the Froglock magnet.
Lvl 29 Bard from the Rathe.
